3: I may have misjudged my condition...
Sophia, we'll take care of the rest from here.
You should retreat with the injured.
Changyu's situation is a bit dire and requires emergency maintenance.
...There are still a lot of Corrupted around though.
Having an injured person here will just hinder our performance, this is our best option.
Don't worry, we'll protect everyone. Sophia, you need to bring Changyu back for maintenance.
I understand, I'll take Changyu back to carriages first.
I'll return immediately after taking care of Changyu.
